original_text: Olive trees will grow everywhere in your land, but you will never use any oil from them. The olives will drop off the trees before they are ready to pick.
korean_text: 네 모든 경내에 감람나무가 있을지라도 그 열매가 떨어지므로 그 기름을 네 몸에 바르지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Olive trees will grow everywhere in your land
sentences.korean_translation: 올리브 나무가 네 땅 모든 곳에서 자라겠지만

sentences.original_text: but you will never use any oil from them
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들에게서 어떤 기름도 결코 사용하지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: The olives will drop off the trees
before they are ready to pick
